overview: Top models, agents, photographers, we're of course talking about, The Sexy Side of Fashion, a modeling agency, and just like all modeling agencies, the most unlikely stories can happen! Top model Eveline Dellai is the wife of the chief photographer, but when he sets eyes on delivery girl Tiffany Tatum for the first time, he can't help but make her his new mistress! Meanwhile, Yennifer Chacon is always flirting with Josh around the office, so maybe it's time to go somewhere more intimate, and Private debutant Lili Charmelle will not only discover her own story, but she will also uncover everyone else's, too!
title: The Sexy Side Of Fashion
